Detailed Description

Author:
Mark Hoemmen
Date:
Time-stamp: <2008-07-16 10:58:30 mhoemmen>
Preliminary, uncompleted new Harwell-Boeing file parser in C.

Function Documentation

void parse_hb_format ( hb_format_t *  format,
const char  s[],
const size_t  lenmax,
char *  buf,
size_t *  buflen,
int *  error 
)

Parse the token stream given by TOKEN into a Fortran 77 format specifier of the form acceptable for Harwell-Boeing sparse matrix files. Return the remaining token stream.

Parameters:
format [OUT]: The parsed format specifier.
s [IN]: The string to parse
buf [OUT]: String buffer for parsing.
buflen [IN/OUT]: Length of BUF array. If not long enough, then set to the required length (see below).
error [OUT]: If FMT_NOMEM, then BUF isn't long enough, and BUFLEN is set to the required value. Otherwise, if not FMT_NO_ERROR, then something went wrong.

Generated on Wed Feb 17 16:45:26 2010 for Sparse Matrix Converter by  1.4.7
